scripts.scss:watch: npm run scss:build-dev && npm run scss:build-dev -- -w
scripts.build:clean: npm run scss:clean && npm run hugo:clean && npm run js:clean
scripts.build:drafts: npm run build:clean && npm run scss:build && npm run js:build-dev && npm run hugo:build-drafts && npm run build:beautify
scripts.build: npm run build:clean && npm run scss:build && npm run js:build && npm run hugo:build && npm run build:beautify
scripts.dev:drafts: concurrently --kill-others "npm run scss:watch" "npm run hugo:serve-drafts" "npm run js:watch"
scripts.dev: concurrently --kill others "npm run scss:watch" "npm run hugo:serve" "npm run js:watch"
scripts.content:update: git submodule update --remote --rebase && git add ./content && git commit -m"Update content submodule"
